column5: Nice fat fish Bubba!Oh and I did notice the sweat shirt.Thats all I have to say

Wow...you and that rig...you'll have to teach me the finer points about it next month at BOQ!!  Great report Glen and a nice big fat fish pic too.  Carp....buffalo....I dont care...fighting a big fish is always fun!
Dang...now dawg is doin the carp thing too. What's this world coming too? LOL  Good to see you out bubba and something pullin your string to boot.
nice carp,always a good fight
thats a big one very nice carp  rob
Well at least that kept ya busy for a while glen !!!!!!! big carp,nice pic....cheers

Nice hat!!!.That shirt looks sorta like a walleye catching shirt.Are you still wearing the same clothes that you were wearing in June?I know you believe in lucky fishing lures but you snag one wall-ice and you wear the same clothes for 4 months?You aint right.. Joe
Wow !!!...that's one big mamma pig of a carp...gives you an idea of why some of us target them...  Ya...nice hat...I gots one just like it...
Looking like a Faux Farm ballcap to me.  Dang Cajuns.

That's a beauty fish GCD  The lack of barbels, the blueish/gray colour and the sharp pointy dorsal fin leads me to believe it's a species of buffalo (perhaps smallmouth buffalo)...Is there anyone out there who can make a positive ID on it?  I've never caught a buffalo before but there's something just not "carpy" about that fish.  Here's one link I found http://www.roughfish.com/id.html
Wow, a carp on shiners, who woulda thunk?  Nice going, nothing like a good fight no matter what kinda fish it is.
WOW  Now that's a carp, awesome G!!!  Joey

MJL - I must say that when I first saw the pic I immediately thought that it wasn't a carp either.  Something 'fishy' about the dorsal fin and mouth.   Looked in the books I've got and sure enough I've got to agree that it looks like it could be a Smallmouth Buffalo.  The book says they average 2-10lbs but the rod and line record is 82lbs!!!!!  GCD - either way great catch and nice big surprise!  What are you gonna catch next from that there deep honey hole of yours?!  007
Hey...everything is a little different in 'bama...don't yah know that! LOL
Whatever it is,carp, buffalo, you look good holding it! I have caught carp on lake shiners here Glen, the vacuum thing, if it`s near their mouth they suck it up.
Nice fish G! Am I the only one that doesn't have one of those hats?? LOL! -Brian
Nice Fish...must be getting cooler there too eh.
Gad, that things a brute Glen !!
It is indeed a Smallmouth Buffalo MJL, thanks for bringing that to my attention! I knew it wasn't exactly a Carp the first time I saw it at the surface because it was silver instead of gold.
Nice one Glen!   Thanks....I learned something new today   Gotta love that hat!!
SCARED ME FOR A SECOND! Thought it was one of those wacky Asian Carp at a quick glance.
WTG GCD, nice fish.
Dang dawg here I thought we was going to have a BBQ in Bama  Glad to see ya out fishing
Nice fish bud but does it count as a carp or not?   Art
PM sent! Joe
